name: Life Is Not The End
description:
Jump from platform to platform. Beware of the shuriken and shoot the activators. Search the level for the entrance to the next level, but be careful! Platforms are destructible - do not make unnecessary movements!

  • One life of the character: a collision with a shuriken or a fall into the abyss.
  • Automatic shot in the direction of the character's movement.
  • Several activators on the level that you need to shoot to open the door to the next level.
  • Destructible platforms from the shots.
  • Changing the shape of the character-changes the mechanics of interaction with the game world:
    - Changes the speed and distance of the bullet.
    - Changes the height of the jump and the speed of movement of the character.
  • A basic jump of normal shape and two more ways to jump higher.
    - The highest jump will require a certain amount of dexterity and pulling out the timing.
  • A zone for permanent retention of the small form of the character.
  • Traps in the form of shuriken with physical properties.
  • On the levels there are areas of darkness or completely night levels.
